words.example: Hello, how are you? — Привет, как дела?
The world is beautiful. — Мир прекрасен.
He is my best friend. — Он мой лучший друг.
I love reading books. — Я люблю читать книги.
I learn English every day. — Я учу английский каждый день.
I am happy to see you. — Я счастлив видеть тебя.
Have a nice day! — Хорошего дня!
What a beautiful day! — Какой красивый день!

texts.title: Приветствие
texts.content: Hello, my friend! Today is a beautiful day. I am happy to see you. The world is full of wonderful things.

texts.title: Изучение
texts.content: I learn something new every day. Reading a good book makes me happy. Knowledge opens the world to us.

texts.title: Дружба
texts.content: A true friend is the most beautiful gift in the world. Hello to all my friends! I am happy to have you in my life.
